name: CrossBlade
description:
Game doesn't load? Try enabling all the page cookies. Still not working? Executable version is available.

Defend yourself from bullets using only a katana and kill enemies with  the deflected bullets. Some powerups will comes in your help.

How many enemies can you kill before you get killed by them?

How to play:

  • Use your mouse to move the katana and deflect bullets.
  • Try to kill the enemies with deflected bullets
  • Hit drones with deflected bullets to get a powerup
  • Use the left mouse button to activate the powerup

Game made for the  Untitled Game Jam #38 and Indiepocalypse Issue #13 (Paying Anthology)
